content.content: 1. (1) A fee of $300 is payable to institute a proceeding with the Board.  (2) Despite subsection (1), a fee of $25 is payable for, (a) each consent appeal that is in addition to a consent appeal to which subsection (1) applies, if it is brought by the same appellant in relation to connected consent applications; and (b) each variance appeal that is in addition to a variance appeal to which subsection (1) applies, if it is brought by the same appellant in relation to connected variance applications.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) A fee of $300 is payable to institute a proceeding with the Board.

(2) Despite subsection (1), a fee of $25 is payable for,

(a) each consent appeal that is in addition to a consent appeal to which subsection (1) applies, if it is brought by the same appellant in relation to connected consent applications; and

(b) each variance appeal that is in addition to a variance appeal to which subsection (1) applies, if it is brought by the same appellant in relation to connected variance applications.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
